professional_summary:
Adaptable Software Engineer specialising in the design and delivery of robust, high-performance systems. I focus on architectural integrity, clean code, and operational reliability — building solutions that scale smoothly from development to production.

My experience spans full-stack development, backend services, database optimisation, and infrastructure automation. This allows me to approach problems holistically and deliver systems that are not only functional but maintainable, secure, and efficient.

I enjoy translating complex business requirements into practical technical solutions that improve performance, reduce operational costs, and support long-term growth.t: update kernel

professional_experience.description: Modernized legacy monolithic systems by transitioning core components into modular, microservices-oriented architectures, significantly improving system scalability and developer velocity. Orchestrated end-to-end CI/CD deployment pipelines and containerization strategies (Docker/Kubernetes), reducing deployment lead times and ensuring environment parity. Engineered robust full-stack solutions, utilizing a modern tech stack to deliver high-performance features in a fast-paced, Agile environment. Optimized database performance and system workflows, ensuring the platform could handle increased user loads during periods of rapid growth. Mentored junior developers and contributed to internal documentation, establishing a culture of technical excellence and collaborative problem-solving.

Developed and maintained mission-critical backend logic for high-volume logistics systems, managing thousands of concurrent daily transactions. Enhanced system reliability and uptime through aggressive database query optimization and the implementation of load-balancing strategies. Ensured 99.9% data integrity across distributed systems by executing rigorous integration testing and error-handling protocols. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to translate complex business logistics into scalable software requirements.

Managed end-to-end network and hardware infrastructure for essential enterprise communications. Executed proactive system maintenance and precise configuration of network devices to ensure zero downtime for critical business operations. Resolved complex technical bottlenecks through systematic troubleshooting of physical and logical network layers.
